title: Scammers emailing me pretending to be lol
body:
So I've never disclosed my email in relation to this account.

Yet today, after several years of being on LoL I suddenly got a scam email from someone pretending to be LoL.

Problem is, this email is only used for purchasing things. So there is no way it would be disclosed to any questionable sites.

So how did they manage to link this email address to my LoL account? I feel that sort of information could only have from Riot?

For the 3 years I've had this email account I've not had a single malicious email, purely because I ONLY ever disclose this email to websites I make purchases from....

Would appreciate some feed back or suggestions

replies.body:
Hi,

Thanks for letting us know - What was the subject of the email and what address did it claim to be coming from?

Cheers
Mindstar

Subject	Mudanças na política de privacidade da Riot
From	League of Legends
To	xxxx
Reply-To	LeagueofLegends.643vqn38z8.fdk6@email.riotgames.com
Date	Today 06:24

I can grab a screen shot if you want, that's just the header details. I wasn't going to click anything nor do I know the language so I could not tell you what the objective was sorry.

Thanks very much for posting the update.  This actually was an email from Riot, but just one that was intended for a different region.

We've just posted about it [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/jZfBIYfU-email-from-riot-in-portuguese-14th-october-2015)

Cheers
Mindstar

Ok, so now you've sent me another email....

Subject Email from Riot in Portuguese - 14th October 2015
From League of Legends
To xxx
Reply-To LeagueofLegends.6x3vqbtfqb.fdk6@email.riotgames.com
Date Wed 20:32

What's in it?
Nothing, it's totally blank....
Can you guys please sort this out, if it's going to continue being a pain, I'm just going to report it as spam and block.

Hey Murdoch,

Thanks for letting me know - its really interesting that it came up blank to you.  The second mail was actually meant to be a clarification about the first mail (along the lines of the boards post we made).  We sent it because not everyone reads boards.

What mail client/service do you use?

Cheers
Mindstar

One that my ISP provides.

It would ask me if I wanted to see the email, if there was anything there, like it did with your first one. But this 2nd email is definitely blank, no notifications on it at all.

I also got this email today, but after I saw it wasnt in english I deleted it. Before I did though, I roughly translated the heading using google translate and it was "Changes in the privacy policy of Riot"
